title: 洞穴蜘蛛和地狱史莱姆刷怪笼setblock指令是什么？
author: 林悦彪

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{EntityId:CaveSpider}          洞穴蜘蛛
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{EntityId:LavaSlime}            地狱史莱姆
具体参见:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210097-1-1.html

replies.author: Kongling_
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
